survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for E-commerce Platforms
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers about their shopping experience on our e-commerce platform, focusing on usability, product variety, and customer service.

questions.question_text: How often do you shop on our e-commerce platform?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure options cover all frequency ranges.
